meanings.definition: A person who leads a life of reckless indulgence in sensual pleasures.
meanings.sent1: The debauchee spent all his money on extravagant parties and luxurious vacations.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the town debauchee for her wild lifestyle and constant partying.
meanings.sent3: The debauchee's idea of a perfect day was lounging by the pool with a cocktail in hand.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a debauchee preceded him wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The debauchee's lavish lifestyle eventually caught up with him, leading to financial ruin.

meanings.definition: To corrupt or seduce someone morally.
meanings.sent1: He tried to debauchee the young minds with his twisted ideologies.
meanings.sent2: The villain's plan was to debauchee the hero's pure heart and turn him to the dark side.
meanings.sent3: The evil sorcerer used dark magic to debauchee the once peaceful kingdom.
meanings.sent4: The forbidden fruit seemed to debauchee even the most virtuous of souls.
meanings.sent5: The sinister whispers in the night sought to debauchee the innocence of the village children.
